channel.title: The Stig is revealed as Michael Schumacher
channel.description:
If you do not live in the UK do ask any questions. This is on mitb.
During Top Gear on 21st June 2009, The Stig revealed his identity as Michael Schumacher. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ycwdHDKwjs
If you do watch Top Gear, What is your thoughts on this? I think its a publicity stunt since his Michaels name is mentioned in the Special Guest column.

item.title: The Stig is revealed as Michael Schumacher

its not really him, it was just their special guest
